summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the acquisition by condemnation of land and other property necessary for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of portions of 2nd Avenue Northwest, 1st Avenue Northwest, Phinney Avenue, Dayton Avenue, Evanston Avenue, Fremont Avenue, North Park Avenue, Stone Avenue, North 127th Street and North 141st Street; providing for the establishing of grades; providing for the necessary slopes for cuts or fills upon the property abutting; and providing for payment from the City Street Fund.
